name: HOPE-ful
description:
Hope-ful is a game we created in 2015 at the GCC GameJam (with another one of our friends, Kristel Yap) and another artist. We did this under the umbrella of "Kaka Productions". The theme was "Hope" and we created a game about a girl who was trying to overcome depression. 

It is a puzzle platformer. Hope, our main character, had two different states of mind, that also dictated the extent of her abilities. When "hope" is activated, our character Hope can jump higher, she can see new paths that she didn't see in her hopeless state.

The game won 3rd place at the jam! 

Created in Gamemaker. All assets original. Music from Youtube creator studio.
